duties_responsibilities.duty: Design purification processes for life-saving vaccines using cutting-edge technologies.
Execution of chromatography, tangential flow filtration, and normal flow filtration systems.
Create process records that efficiently facilitate capture of data.
Execute protein purifications specifically AKTA chromatography systems and UNICORN software.

education_certification.credential: BS in Chemical Engineering, Biochemistry, or a related discipline, with 5-8 +years of industry experience. Preferably in Process Development.
